content: the textured crochet dishcloth is easy to make and results in a double-thickness so you can really scrub those dishes well this dishcloth is simple to crochet because it uses just one stitch and a simple variation of it you ll want to make this with cotton yarn so it washes well and is gentle on your pots pans and dishes to create this dishcloth you need to know how to do the chain slip_stitch and half_double_crochet stitch that s it
